title: g1gltd
author: g1gltd
content: Need to verify a US marketplace or processing account? Our VBA service can be added to any service or platform that requires manual bank verification via small deposit. Get your US Paypal, Ebay, Etsy, Mercari etc accounts verified today.You'll receive:Bank account numberRouting numberNon-black listed banks$10Process:After placing an order you`ll receive the account number and routing number to your USA VBA account. Go to your platform of choice and select manual deposit. Two small test deposits will be sent to the VBA. Contact us 12 to 48 hours later to receive your test deposit amounts.Instant deliveryWe accept most crypto and can accept Payoneer for orders over $50.Telegram: https://t.me/g1gltd@g1gltd
